name: Offroad Bike: Motocross Stunts
description:
Offroad Bike: Motocross Stunts is an exciting and realistic bike racing game. Ride your Bike on dangerous hilly roads and treacherous terrains.
FEATURES
- Stunning 3D graphics
- Dangerous hilly roads
- Ride under extreme weather conditions like Rain and Fog
- Smooth and realistic bike handling
- Realistic game sounds
